text:
Muje 18/03/2025 ko delivery liya hain river indi scooter ka 3 mistake or batata hoon...

1) handel jo hain achan nahin hain 2 to 5 km chalane ke baad sholder and hand main pain star ho jaega.
2) ground clearance sai nahin hain normal bump main main stand touch hota hain and lover body se khatarnak sound aata hain.
3) 2 person ke bethne ke baad suspension bahot down ho jata hain...  Main stand again sound karega esa lagega ki stand khulkar gir gaya hoga.....üò¢üò¢üò¢
